[AUTO][ci skip]: updating cocos2dx_files.json
Cpp-tests app crashes after opening Socket IO
data.body:
1. Build and run cpp-tests from v3 
2. From the main menu go to Extensions > Socket IO Test
3. Click on the Open SocketIO Client  and wait for a after a few seconds
4. Click Back and select another test - cpp-tests app crashes after about a second or two

(reproduced on Windows 10, and Windows 8.1 and Win32 platforms)

milestone.title: v3.7
milestone.description:
Current Plan:
- Beta release: June 15th.
- RC0 release: June 25th.
- RC1 release: July 14th.
- Final release: About July 20th.

data.body:
With this commit 67d008810377a3cbad63f9af73beb02e8a1af297 I get a lot of IllegalArgumentExceptions for Android 2.3.3 - 2.3.7

`Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: ALIGN_LEFT is not a constant in class android.text.Layout$Alignment
at java.lang.Enum.valueOf(Enum.java:176)
at android.text.Layout$Alignment.valueOf(Layout.java:1947)
at org.cocos2dx.lib.Cocos2dxBitmap.createTextBitmapShadowStroke(Cocos2dxBitmap.java:101)
... 5 more`

ALIGN_LEFT and ALIGN_RIGHT are not values of this enum (and never were, it seems):
http://developer.android.com/reference/android/text/Layout.Alignment.html

data.title: Label::createWithTTF() does not support Arabic language
data.body: Please make the "Label::createWithTTF()" to support Arabic language, because in the version cocos2d-x v3.6 still does not support arabic language although I used an arabic font file.

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding automatically
Change physics3d api to jsb namespace
It is time to support resizable Open GL view/window
data.body:
Currently desktop version doesn't support resizing like normal windows. We should be able to resize window, and with that resize OpenGl view. There should be some kind of callback that will return us new visible size, so we can reposition all elements on the screen. This will give us option to test different aspect ratios while resizing a window. This should also be implemented with all other platforms. Since beginning iOS9 and split view, app can be resized while running.

Before i've switched to cocos2d-x i was using LibGDX, and that feature helped me to develop games easily for all aspect ratios, since i was dynamically positioning elements depending on the screen size.

data.body:
`version:` 3.7alpha
`issue:` Director::setClearColor(const Color4F& clearColor) have no effect. v3.6 is OK.
`reproduce:` add following code to HelloWorld project, init function.

``` cpp
    Director::getInstance()->setClearColor(Color4F::RED);
```

data.title: Update the reference of submodule cocos2d-console.
Fix Physics3D test and js bindings
Fixed warn
On a MacOS, pressing enter/return on a textfield is ignored.
data.body:
On iOS, when you press "Enter / Return" on the virtual keyboard goes away and the app receive a DETACH_WITH_IME event.

On mac, the keypress is just ignored (UICCTextField.cpp line 82).

Not sure is this is a wanted behavior or not, but that mean you cant validate your input by pressing enter if you have a physical keyborad.
